radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonspecific bowel-gas pattern, with no evidence of free air or bowel obstruction.
Slightly echogenic liver and pericholecystic fluid, with no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary-duct dilatation.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Markedly enlarged liver with diffuse hypoattenuation consistent with fatty infiltration and pericholecystic fluid.
Advanced myelination of the white matter in the cerebral hemispheres with no focal abnormalities; prominent abnormal lipid peaks at 1.4 and 0.9 ppm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Abnormal lipid peaks were no longer seen on spectroscopy performed when the patient was 15 months old.
